body: DLL load failed: The paging file is too small for this operation to complete.

issue.title: XSeg training fails to start

repository.name: DeepFaceLab
repository.description: DeepFaceLab is the leading software for creating deepfakes.

issue.body:
This is pretty much a copy paste of Pylon69's post since I get the exact same problem. I tried his solution by moving DFL to the OS drive but I keep getting the same error. 

Problem still exists on the newest version (build_05_06_2020) downloaded from Mega

### **Expected behavior**

Expect "5.XSeg) train.bat" to run just like the tutorial

### **Actual behavior**

"5.XSeg) train.bat," after you've selected face type and started the training before sampling even starts I get a memory error.

```
`Running trainer.


Model first run.

Choose one or several GPU idxs (separated by comma).

[CPU] : CPU
  [0] : GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER

[0] Which GPU indexes to choose? :
0

[wf] Face type ( h/mf/f/wf/head ?:help ) :
wf
```

I've tried my GPU and CPU and they both result in the same memory error

### **Steps to reproduce**

Following the Mini Tutorial step by step.

### **Other relevant information**

Windows 10
AMD 3900X
RTX 2070 Super latest driver
32gb 3600mhz ram

Edit: @iperov mentioned paging file is too small in issue #735 which is the same as my issue, I thought I should say that my paging file is 4.9GB.
